td.content: s:a 76 year old female complains of moderate shortness of breath on exertion x 4 weeks. td.content: s:pt presents w/ c/o 12 days h/o severe pain on exertion relieved by rest, severe chest pain on exertion, moderate shortness of breath on exertion and Heart. patient is a white female aged 76 yrs. she does not smoke Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol o:Height 176 cm, Weight 57.1 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15, ECG LEFT Ventricular Hypertrophy, Chest = bibasilar rales, Heart = S3 is present, PMI is displaced, Heart = S4 present, 3/6 systolic murmur radiating to the neck, PMI is displaced, Extremities = 3+ pitting edema, Chest = B/L crackles are present the lower lobes, decrease breath sounds a:Chronic Congestive Heart Failure p:administered valsartan - 160 mg 2 x day, performed ECG, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
